scripts2.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts2.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons && mkdir -p dist/images && svg-sprite-generate -d src/images/icons -o dist/images/icons.svg
scripts2.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts2.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts2.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts2.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts2.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
